src:
Sofyan Basir Divonis Bebas, Pimpinan KPK Pastikan Ambil Upaya Hukum
04 Nov 2019, 21:10 by Ahmad Bil Wahid
Jakarta - Pimpinan KPK sudah bertemu untuk membahas vonis bebas yang diterima mantan Dirut PLN, Sofyan Basir. KPK memastikan akan mengambil upaya hukum.
"Lima pimpinan sudah ketemu dan saya pikir kita akan lakukan upaya hukum, dan kita form kok di situ. Dan nanti kita lihat hasilnya seperti apa," kata Wakil Ketua KPK, Saut Situmorang, di Gedung Penunjang KPK, Jalan Kuningan Persada, Jakarta Selatan, Senin (4/11/2019).
Saut mengatakan, KPK menghargai putusan hakim yang memberikan vonis bebas. Upaya hukum yang akan diambil itu menurut Saut merupakan upaya check and balance oleh KPK.
"Saya selalu mengatakan KPK harus check and balance, apa yang dilakukan oleh KPK harus di-check and balance. Ini bagian dari check and balance, makanya kita lakukan check ulang dengan upaya hukum," ujarnya.
text:
Sofyan Basir Sentenced Free, KPK Leaders Make Sure Take Legal Efforts
04 Nov 2019, 21:10 by Ahmad Bil Wahid
Jakarta - KPK leaders have met to discuss the acquittal received by former Managing Director of PLN, Sofyan Basir. KPK ensures that it will take legal action.
"Five leaders have already been met and I think we will take legal action, and we form them there. And then we will see the results," said KPK Deputy Chairman, Saut Situmorang, at the KPK Support Building, Jalan Kuningan Persada, South Jakarta, Monday (4/11/2019).
Saut said the KPK respected the judge's decision that gave a free sentence. According to Saut, the legal effort to be taken is a check and balance effort by the KPK.
"I always say the KPK must check and balance, what the KPK has to do must be checked and balance. This is part of the check and balance, so we do a re-check with legal efforts," he said.
